title: how can i transfer RP from one country to another?
body: i am staying for one year  in canada and i bought a RP card, but i canÂ´t add those RP to my account, because they are in another server. What can i do?

replies.body: RP Cards are separated regionally, so it's not possible to use an EU Card for an NA region for example.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into this for you.  I can't make any guarantees, but we'll see what we can do for you!

Hmm this one sounds tricky.

I can't guarantee that they CAN solve this for you, but your best bet is to send in a ticket to contact customer support and see if they can give you a hand with this since it's an account related issue and something they they would probably have to do manually. Hopefully things work out well.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
